TextBlock.Text: TOPAZ: Note to self: remember to get more oil for joints next time you see Onyx.
TOPAZ: Note to self: Code is 5337, DO NOT FORGET!
TOPAZ: Note to self: get Diamond something nice, he's been working his hind quarters off!
TOPAZ: Note to self: Make sure you send a message to Moonstone and Cinnabar when the experiment is complete letting them know their brothers are safe.
